choices: TV show or cartoon or anime universe
A fictional universe from a book
1.content:
In Hakugyokurou...

"Raaaaan... I'm so boreeeddddd," Yukari mutters.

"Yukari-sama, there are a lot of beautiful places in Gensokyo and out. You have every power you need to go out there. so, WHAT ARE YOU DOING SITTING THERE WHINING AT ME?!" Ran angrily shouts from the next room in Yuyuko's settlement.

Yukari gaps to the clouds of gensokyo and thinks,'Ran, such a jerk sometimes. Meh, couldn't blame her. But I've explored every place possible on this planet. I'm 1400 years old. With that time I did absolutely everything I can. Hmmm... It's pretty rare I explore other universes though. Why don't I go there? Or send and watch someone there?

After quite some time thinking, she then wants to send someone to...
1.title: The origin of the story

12.content: Who is she sending?
12.title: Video game universe

1231.content: Ooooh, which game?
1231.title: Reimu Hakurei

choices: Frisk is doing a pacifist path.
12311.content:
"Hmmm, why am I worried about her? She is such a bastard to most of us and burns our faces! she kinda deserves this," Yukari said to herself, flying towards the Hakurei shrine. "Hey, Reimu."

"What do you want you gap youkai?" Reimu asks menacingly.

"What do you think about getting teleported to a different universe?"

"Yukari NO. You've been talking about this for d-AAAAAAAAAAAAAH-" Reimu gets cut off as one of Yukari's gap sucked her into it and gets her to the ruins.

She wakes up, looks around, and finds out that...
12311.title: Undertale

choices: Why are you calling me your child?
123111.content:
"Ughh, where am I?" she grumbles while getting up. She looks around, it looks like she is in a deep hole-like cave with some pillars rising around her. She also sees the exit on top, so she flies up. She was almost halfway when there's- *THUMP* "Oof!" -an invisible barrier trapping her in.

"Dammit Yukari, can't let me get out of your ways, huh? Wherever you're watching, mark my words, you will regret your choice."

"Howdy!" shouts a rather silly-sounding voice that echoed through the cave. But Reimu, not looking at the source of it, which was behind her, did not expect that.

Dream Sign "Evil-Sealing Circle" "Take this!!!"

"Huh-" flowey mutters before hiding underground again to dodge the incoming attack.

He then goes up again in the same place after the attack finished, "WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT FOR?! YOU COULD'VE KILLED ME!"

"It would serve you right for scaring me like that. Who are you and how are you talking?"

"My name's Flowey! Nice to meet you, NOT."

"My name's Reimu, and I'm here to escape this place. Now lead the way, Flower!"

"I'M NOT YOUR SLAVE YOU LITTLE PIECE OF SH--AACK", a fireball came out of nowhere, hitting Flowey off-guard by the side. You look to where he went with it, but he already disappeared.

"My child! Are you ok?" said a voice behind where Flowey was. It was a humanoid Goat with 2 horns and a purple dress.

You answer...
123111.title: Goatmom?

12333.content: The last major character list
12333.title: Others

15.content:
Don't like any of the other choices? Or maybe you read all of them...

Online Story crossover: You create a story of a Touhou girl(s) going to the universe of someone's story from WdC, Wattpad, Deviantart, etc.

Actually others: Insert other ideas that are not Videogames, tv shows, movies, books, anime, cartoons, or online stories.

Outside influence scenario: For those who want to contradict the rule and move a Touhou girl not because of Yukari but from someone outside. (e.g: Gaster)

Fanfic crossover: Quite like the 'Online story crossover' path but in here you do a crossover on someone's fanfic instead of an original story. You can crossover a crossover! (crossoverception)

Create your own universe: Yukari chooses to dig into your imagination and move someone there. (use your imagination to the max and create your own fantasy for them!)
15.title: Others

info.brief_description: Any Touhou girl gets the opportunity to go to other universes whether they like it or not.
info.description:
Yukari feels mischievous and decides to send someone(or herself) to another universe. She'll be watching the whole way)

Rules to this:

1. Send someone that actually plays a role in the game. (No just one random fairy or spirit. If you send a fairy, it has to be someone like Cirno or Clownpiece)

2. No vore, gore, or excessive/detailed explanation of blood/death.

3. No sexual content.

4. Choice chapters are only allowed whenever necessary.

5. Keep the characters' personality the same as in the video game/manga.

6. It is recommended at some point(if you choose someone else than her) to change POV to Yukari checking on them cuz the story is she wants to see the other's reaction to the new place but don't want to kill them.

7. THE GAP HAG RULES. Ohh and if Reimu finds out about this mischief of Yukari's, she'll try to beat her up.

8. Battles between characters are allowed.

9. The person sent cannot die and the story only could be ended when the person comes back or if you don't want to end it at all, give choices on what adventure does that same person will get again to another verse.

HAVE FUN WITH THE CROSSOVER STUFF Y'ALL. Anything is allowed, from Disney movies, video games, books, even other stories in WdC, Deviantart, Wattpad etc, just remember to provide the link to the original story first. THIS IS THE FULL ON CROSSOVER INTERACTIVE SO GO CRAZY.
